sub_title: Helping structural engineers turn their imagination into reality - Key Account Manager @Nemetschek Engineering
summary:
B2B SALES & MARKETING, PROJECT MANAGEMENT AND BUSINESS CONSULTANCY
My specialty areas are Business Development, Sales & Marketing Management, GTM Strategies, Project Management, Business Consultancy, Business Intelligence and System Integration.

Involved in B2B Sales & Business Development for Enterprise Solutions, close to 15 years and still loving it. Assignments as VP Business Development in EMEA for a big multinational company, managing a highly specialized and remote team, working as a Global Business Director as part of the Strategic Team for a mid-size company, and as Business Development Manager in a self-starting position, managing the Benelux region responsible to develop the GTM strategy and targeting Process & Energy markets.

ENTERPRISE S/W SOLUTIONS
Background of my experience is focused on Enterprise Software Sales as SaaS solution or on-premises in the field of Digital Asset Management, Information Management, Digital Twins, Data-Driven Engineering, Total Cost Management, and Project Management.

INTERNATIONAL CONTEXT
Used to work in an international and dynamic environment, managing an Agile team of Marketing, BDs, and Sales reps to support SMEs and €100K deals up to large multinationals and multimillion Enterprise deals.

INDUSTRIES: PROCESS / CHEMICAL / CONSTRUCTION / ENERGY / MARINE / FOOD / PHARMA
Over the past 20+ years, I have been helping companies to achieve their goals in improving efficiency and profitability in industries such as Process, Chemical, Energy, Marine, F&B, Pharma, Mining, Construction, Infrastructure, etc. Serving Engineering, EPCs, Government-Owned and Owner Operator companies like Flour, IHC, Rijkswaterstaat, Shell, Yara, Heineken, and many more.

DRIVING GROWTH & PROFITABILITY
Achieved overall business growth in EMIA in 2018 by +66% in 2018 and +50% in 2019, increasing the pipeline with qualified opportunities by 200% in 2020.

DEVELOPED HIGH-PERFORMANCE TEAM
Hired and educated a dedicated SDR and BD-Team and achieved a high engagement level.

LEVERAGING GTM STRATEGY FOR OUTCOME BASED SALES
Responsible to roll out and regional alignment to apply the global GTM strategy and provide education & training to all staff.

DEVELOPING NEW BUSINESS CHANNELS
Extensive C and M-Level network in the industry (8K+ connections).

Customer Success Management, high-level Product Strategies, set Acquisition priorities, and Managing Strategic Global Alliances.

Feel free to contact me at: m.v.vliet@scia.net or (+31) 6 15 36 72 23

authors.headline: Helping structural engineers turn their imagination into reality - Key Account Manager @Nemetschek Engineering

profile_positions.description:
Key Account Management, responsible for the annual organizational plan for sales and local marketing activities in the region while taking into account both the short-term and long-term objectives. 

Autonomous role, to work closely with the Inside Sales team, the Marketing team, the Customer Service team and report directly to the Chief Sales Officer. 

Acting as a true ambassador and living up to the top-quality standards of SCIA known for its excellent retention rate. Manage expectations in order to further develop long-term customer relationships, and offer value-based solutions. 

Providing technical sales presentations to technical directors & high-level executives and offering the customers a higher and differentiating value proposition.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Self-starting position in the Benelux to develop an effective GTM strategy, to create brand awareness and strategically analyse markets and trends and overlay this with the current portfolio to understand the potential whitespace in existing and new target areas. 
			
Accountable for business development, targets, and P&L, including new customer acquisition, up-sales, cross-sales and customer satisfaction in the region. 			

Create Marketing & Sales plans to identify growth opportunities, create visibility and manage the Sales funnel to deliver on growth initiatives. 

Assess the competition positioning in different segments and applications and develop playbooks including Ideal Customer and Buyer Profiles, targeted messaging, and positioning of our solutions to understand our added value, unique selling points, customer needs and main differentiators.

Weekly discussions with the Management team to review the Sales pipeline and KPIs to ensure delivery of targets and execution of agreed actions.

Participate in strategic meetings with the C-Team to discuss and review potential growth areas, 
M&A candidates for portfolio & territory expansion and benchmark our offering against the competition and demands of the market. 

Collaborate closely with Marketing to deploy brand awareness initiatives like campaigns, events, content creation, etc. to supporting the region’s targets.
			
Collaborate with the solution Product Owners and Customer support, to commercially develop new applications from customer feedback and future trends.

Participate in sales activities including customer site visits, telephone contacts, events, presentations, and demonstrations to deliver outcome based messages to potential customers.

Engage with opportunities for technological and commercial partnerships that will allow to identify potential expansion of our portfolio to deliver on company’s strategic imperatives and growth.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager Benelux - Industry Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Monitor developments in the market, craft business cases and ensure competitive analysis to support 
sales. Prepare and present to promote the product direction.

Work directly with Sales and regional Business Development team in EMIA to selected prospects, to 
ensure solution support and onsite demonstrations of products on customer locations.

Work with prospects and existing clients to continuously improve the performance of products and 
employees.

Work directly with selected clients to ensure successful implementation / rollout in combination with 
Project Management, Service and Sales teams.

Attend user conferences, regional sales meetings etc. to present strategy. People management and team development.

Effective usage of team resources, planning and forecasting of budget and monitoring expenses.
Close cooperation with Marketing on product launch information, seminars, trade fairs, etc.
profile_positions.title: Vice President Business Development EMIA

profile_positions.description:
Build and maintain relational networks and approach new leads, prospects 	and existing customers to strengthen the company’s order portfolio for the software and consultancy department. 
Active promotion and participation of marketing activities and campaigns to support Management.
Responsible for the functional specification, 	presentations and demonstrations of new and existing software in the field of Cost Engineering.
Develop new templates and updates for annual frame agreements, contracts, general pricing, terms and conditions and setup the objectives and targets and visions for the long term.
Perform business negotiations and continuously be aware of signals from the market regarding competitors, new developments and demands.
profile_positions.title: Business Director

profile_positions.description:
Team leader of the services department of consultants and cost engineers. 
Planning of new projects and execution, implementation, delivery, financial administration, after-sales and management reporting.
Software implementations and training, in the field of Cost Engineering. 
Responsible for the functional specification, 	presentations and demonstrations of new and existing Cost Engineering software.
In a team or independently preparation of multidisciplinary budget or detail cost estimates for the chemical and petrochemical industry and civil construction, using Cleopatra Enterprise and other software.
profile_positions.title: Cost Engineer

profile_positions.description:
In a team or independently preparation of multidisciplinary budget or detail cost estimates for the chemical and petrochemical industry and civil construction, using Cleopatra and other software.
Development and maintenance of databases and coding structures. 
Give presentations and provide training courses for the use of Cleopatra software. 
Write operation manuals and instruction materials to support the software training courses. 
Design, plan and maintain the company webpages.
profile_positions.title: Multidisciplinary Cost Estimator

profile_positions.description:
Independently prepare tender packages and work packages to support the execution of work for civil construction, using a set of cost estimation tools. 
Preparation and administration of work variations (additional work).
Follow-up and guidance of property owners in new and existing
construction projects.
profile_positions.title: Calculator
